Stop updating for a few years and let the world's top tier games go bankrupt without saying. Is Overwatch2, which has been talked about for so many years, this thing? The changes to the entire game are not as significant as a single version update. What have employees been busy with these years? Office sexual harassment? Take a look at the comments from veteran players in the CG anime of the Watch 2 trailer back then. Currently, there seem to be only two words: heartache. It will only force players to spend time deceiving them of their money. Promising to be the ace, PVE has been dragging on and on. Finally, bring up a castrated version of PVE. Blizzard no longer deserves the trust of players. Please cherish your life and stay away from Blizzard games.

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Awful day today.
I had 2 copies of Overwatch 2 in my car and someone broke in and left 2 more.

I am really on the edge here if recommend or not recommend, but thinking about it, it's mostly because of nostalgia.

I am not recommending this game because of the recent 2 years of actions (and lack of actions too) from Blizzard towards this game. 

They announced Overwatch 2, with big PVE update, skill trees and leveling up. Looked pretty neat so preordered the bundle, to support the development and looked forward to play the finished product.. Yet not so long before launch they stripped the game of PVE, just put in a battlepass for money.

So instead of huge update with new gamemode and features, we got Overwatch 1, with loot boxes removed (that was a fun way to get all the skins for just playing the game), and we got all the stuff from OW1 purchasable for ridiculous prices in the shop instead. It was a huge downgrade in my opinion.

And now after less than a year you put in some PVE missions, without skill tree or leveling up, and you want another money for it? What a joke.

P.S.: The current battlepass contains a spray that was given for free a few years ago (level 13 in battlepass). So they are even recycling old items in battlepasses now. Absolutely ridiculous. There's no excuse for that.
The only positive of this is that i dont need that shitty battle.net launcher to play the game
rule34 is also free and has better OW content
